Package bisq.core.dao.node.consensus

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BsqBlockController
    Checks if a block is valid and if so adds it to the BsqBlockChain.
    BsqTxController
    Verifies if a given transaction is a BSQ transaction.
    GenesisTxController
    Verifies if a given transaction is a BSQ genesis transaction.
    GenesisTxOutputController
    Checks if an output is a BSQ output and apply state change.
    IssuanceController  
    OpReturnBlindVoteController
    Verifies if OP_RETURN data matches rules for a blind vote tx and applies state change.
    OpReturnCompReqController
    Verifies if OP_RETURN data matches rules for a compensation request tx and applies state change.
    OpReturnController
    Verifies if a given transaction is a BSQ OP_RETURN transaction.
    OpReturnProposalController
    Verifies if OP_RETURN data matches rules for a compensation request tx and applies state change.
    OpReturnVoteRevealController
    Verifies if OP_RETURN data matches rules for a vote reveal tx and applies state change.
    TxInputController
    Processes TxInput and add input value to available balance if the input is a valid BSQ input.
    TxInputsController
    Iterates all inputs to calculate the available BSQ balance from all inputs and apply state change.
    TxOutputController
    Checks if an output is a BSQ output and apply state change.
    TxOutputsController
    Iterates all outputs for verification for BSQ outputs and sets the txType.
